resource_dependency.stockDataAPI: An API for retrieving real-time and historical stock data, including basic info, market trends, and financials.
resource_dependency.reportGenerationAPI: An API that accepts user-defined parameters (stock code/name, format, content) and returns a generated report.

function: Enable users to search for stocks by entering stock codes or names via an input field.
static_description: A centered search bar with a navy border and placeholder text 'Enter stock code or name'. A navy-colored search icon aligned to the right inside the input field.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking the search icon or pressing Enter after typing initiates the stock lookup request to the backend API.
As the user types, the input updates dynamically without triggering a search until submission.

function: Allow users to customize their stock report by selecting preferred formats and content sections.
static_description: Two sections displayed below the search area: 'Report Format' and 'Content Sections', each containing labeled checkboxes in navy color. Default unchecked state uses checkboxUncheckedIcon; checked state uses checkboxCheckedIcon.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking a checkbox toggles its selection status between checked and unchecked states.

resource_dependency.reportGenerationAPI: An API that accepts user-defined parameters (stock code/name, format, content) and returns a generated report.

function: Trigger the automated generation of customized stock reports based on selected options.
static_description: A navy 'Generate Report' button positioned beneath the customization options, featuring generateButtonIcon to the left of the label text.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking the button sends the current selections (stock identifier, format, content) to the backend API to initiate report generation.

resource_dependency.stockInfoSchema: Database schema for storing stock metadata such as symbol, company name, sector, industry, exchange, etc.
resource_dependency.stockInfoAPI: An API endpoint that retrieves basic stock information using stock identifiers.

function: Display essential stock information within the generated reports.
static_description: A dedicated section titled 'Basic Stock Information' at the top of the generated report showing fields like Symbol, Company Name, Sector, Industry, Exchange, etc., styled in navy headings over white background.

resource_dependency.marketTrendsSchema: Database schema containing time-series price/volume data for trend visualization.
resource_dependency.marketTrendsAPI: An API returning historical pricing and volume data used to render trend charts.

function: Visualize and display market trends relevant to the selected stock within the generated reports.
static_description: A chart container labeled 'Market Trends' embedded in the report, rendering line graphs or candlestick plots using trendChartComponent against a white background.

resource_dependency.financialDataSchema: Database schema storing quarterly/yearly financial statements including revenue, net income, EPS, etc.
resource_dependency.financialDataAPI: An API providing structured access to financial statement data per stock.

function: Present detailed financial data within the generated reports.
static_description: A table titled 'Financial Data' rendered using financialDataTableComponent, displaying rows for periods (Q1â€“Q4/Years) and columns for metrics like Revenue, Net Income, Earnings Per Share (EPS), etc., styled with navy headers.

function: Apply consistent white background styling across all pages and components.
static_description: All webpages utilize a global CSS class applying a solid white background (#FFFFFF) behind all content containers.

function: Ensure all interactive and static components use navy as the primary accent color.
static_description: Text labels, form controls, buttons, icons, and borders inherit styles from a globally defined navy-themed CSS class.

resource_dependency.serviceDescriptionText: Our platform enables fast and insightful stock reporting tailored to your preferences. Search any stock, choose what you want to see, and get professional-grade summaries instantly.

function: Introduce visitors to the stock report generation service through a welcoming homepage interface.
static_description: Homepage layout features heroImage centered above a brief paragraph styled with serviceDescriptionText, followed by a prominent call-to-action directing users to begin searching.

resource_dependency.reportOutputAPI: An API serving pre-generated report data including text blocks, charts, tables, and formatting metadata.

function: Display fully generated stock reports once processing completes.
static_description: A clean, scrollable card-based view titled 'Generated Stock Report', styled with reportContainerStyles, presenting fetched content from the backend.

function: Ensure seamless usability and visual consistency across desktop and mobile platforms.
static_description: Layout adjusts fluidly under responsiveMediaQueries, reorganizing elements vertically, scaling fonts appropriately, and optimizing touch targets for smaller screens while preserving core functionality.

function: Provide feedback during asynchronous operations such as data fetching and report generation.
static_description: During active requests, loadingOverlay covers the main content area with semi-transparent overlay and spinnerAsset spinning centrally.

resource_dependency.errorHandlingMiddleware: Backend middleware intercepting invalid inputs or missing resources before responding to frontend.

function: Notify users when issues occur due to incorrect stock codes or inaccessible data sources.
static_description: Inline error messages appear beneath affected components, styled according to errorMessageStyles, conveying clear reasons such as 'Invalid stock symbol' or 'Data temporarily unavailable.'

resource_dependency.frontendAPIClient: Axios client configured to communicate with backend endpoints using base URL /api/
resource_dependency.databaseConnectionConfig: PostgreSQL connection established using environment variables: DB_HOST=localhost, DB_PORT=5432, DB_USERNAME=myappuser, DB_PASSWORD=myapppassword, DB_NAME=myapp

function: Serve dynamic frontend content sourced entirely from backend APIs connected to a PostgreSQL database.
static_description: Frontend application bootstrapped with frontendAPIClient pointing to internal API routes, which proxy requests to services interacting with databaseConnectionConfig.

resource_dependency.dbSchemaDefinition: CREATE TABLE stocks (symbol VARCHAR PRIMARY KEY, name TEXT, sector TEXT, industry TEXT, exchange TEXT); CREATE TABLE financials (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, stock_symbol VARCHAR REFERENCES stocks(symbol), period DATE, revenue NUMERIC, net_income NUMERIC, eps NUMERIC); CREATE TABLE market_trends (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, stock_symbol VARCHAR REFERENCES stocks(symbol), date DATE, open_price NUMERIC, close_price NUMERIC, volume BIGINT);

function: Establish persistence layer supporting stock lookup, financials retrieval, and trend tracking via PostgreSQL integration.
static_description: Database initialized with dbSchemaDefinition managed through postgresConnectionModule leveraging standard PG driver and secure credential injection.
